lyrics.lyric: I remember tears streaming down your face
lyrics.tlyric: 我记得泪水顺着你的脸颊流下

lyrics.lyric: When I said, I'll never let you go
lyrics.tlyric: 当我说我将永不放开你的手

lyrics.lyric: When all those shadows almost killed your light
lyrics.tlyric: 当所有的阴影几乎挡住了你的光亮

lyrics.lyric: I remember you said, Don't leave me here alone
lyrics.tlyric: 我记得你说过：“别把我一个人扔下。

lyrics.lyric: But all that's dead and gone and passed tonight
lyrics.tlyric: 但这一切都在今晚化作尘埃

lyrics.lyric: No one can hurt you now
lyrics.tlyric: 如今没有人能伤害你了

lyrics.lyric: You and I'll be safe and sound
Don't you dare look out your window darling
lyrics.tlyric: 亲爱的，你害怕看到窗外吧

lyrics.lyric: The war outside our door keeps raging on
lyrics.tlyric: 门外的战争仍在激烈的进行
牢牢记得我为你唱的这支摇篮曲

lyrics.lyric: No one can hurt you now
lyrics.tlyric: 如今没有人能伤害你了

lyrics.lyric: You and I'll be safe and sound
You and I'll be safe and sound...

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Taylor Swift
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Taylor Swift/Joy Williams/John Paul White/T Bone Burnett
[00:16.319]I remember tears streaming down your face
[00:19.330]When I said, I'll never let you go
[00:22.700]When all those shadows almost killed your light
[00:29.240]I remember you said, Don't leave me here alone
[00:34.789]But all that's dead and gone and passed tonight
[00:41.288]
[00:43.598]Just close your eyes
[00:46.698]The sun is going down
[00:48.780]You'll be alright
[00:53.499]No one can hurt you now
[00:56.318]Come morning light
[01:00.398]You and I'll be safe and sound
[01:09.058]
[01:22.660]Don't you dare look out your window darling
[01:26.699]Everything's on fire
[01:29.580]The war outside our door keeps raging on
[01:35.819]Hold on to this lullaby
[01:42.560]Even when the music's gone
[01:48.810]
[01:54.479]Just close your eyes
[01:58.600]The sun is going down
[02:00.808]You'll be alright
[02:05.399]No one can hurt you now
[02:08.060]Come morning light
[02:12.029]You and I'll be safe and sound
[02:20.539]
[02:47.840]Just close your eyes
[02:54.539]You'll be alright
[03:00.299]Come morning light,
[03:05.100]You and I'll be safe and sound...

tlyric.lyric:
[00:16.319]我记得泪水顺着你的脸颊流下
[00:19.330]当我说我将永不放开你的手
[00:22.700]当所有的阴影几乎挡住了你的光亮
[00:29.240]我记得你说过：“别把我一个人扔下。
[00:34.789]但这一切都在今晚化作尘埃
[00:41.288]
[00:43.598]只需闭上你的眼睛
[00:46.698]太阳已西沉
[00:48.780]你会没事的
[00:53.499]如今没有人能伤害你了
[00:56.318]当明日晨光初现
[01:00.398]我们都将安然无恙
[01:09.058]
[01:22.660]亲爱的，你害怕看到窗外吧
[01:26.699]一切都在燃烧
[01:29.580]门外的战争仍在激烈的进行
[01:35.819]牢牢记得我为你唱的这支摇篮曲
[01:42.560]即使音乐已经停止
[01:48.810]
[01:54.479]只需闭上你的眼睛
[01:58.600]太阳已西沉
[02:00.808]你会没事的
[02:05.399]如今没有人能伤害你了
[02:08.060]当明日晨光初现
[02:12.029]我们都将安然无恙
[02:20.539]
[02:47.840]只需闭上你的眼睛
[02:54.539]你会没事的
[03:00.299]当明日晨光初现
[03:05.100]我们都将安然无恙...
